name: svg-jww-viewer
description: SVG JWW file viewer powered by MoonBit
author: f12o

scripts.build:types: mkdir -p dist && cp target/js/release/build/svg_jww_ui/svg_jww_ui.d.ts dist/index.d.ts && cp target/js/release/build/svg_jww_ui/moonbit.d.ts dist/moonbit.d.ts
scripts.build: pnpm run clean && pnpm run build:moon && pnpm run build:bundle && pnpm run build:types && pnpm run build:copy
scripts.set-version: node scripts/sync-version.js && git add package.json moon.mod.json examples/package.json
